subject: Simsonn USB box issues
description_text:
I recently upgraded my control box from the one that came with the pro
pedals that I bought about 6-9 months ago. I do believe it is an older
version of your pedals. I recently bought the VAM haptic motors and
purchased the new control box that has the outlets to power the motors, the
Plus x control box . When I initially plugged it in, it gave me an option
to upgrade the software, which I did then. With the new version of the
software upgraded I tested all 3 pedals which seemed to calibrate fine and
was picking up a signal just fine. The motors were working with testing as
well. I then went into Iracing and it was unable to pick up the pedal
inputs. I decided to restart my computer after this to see if that would
fix the issue. I did not restart my device as anything was updating. After
doing so, the pedals are no longer being recognized at all by the software.
I have done several things to try and rectify this issue. I uninstalled and
reinstalled all simmson software from my device, but i still have the same
issue with the software not recognizing the pedals or not even letting me
click anywhere in the software page for the pedals. I'm also not able to do
a manual update to change drivers or anything. In addition to this the
pedals work just fine with the old box even in the new software. I'm sure
there is a way to rectify this but I am having no luck at all. I would
really like to continue to use your products as they provide great value
and have been fine in use up until this point. Any help or potential
replacement box would be greatly appreciated. Attached are picture of my
simsonn products for reference.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ramzee Williams,    You can use SIMSONN Manager v2.1.3 to manually restore the PlusX firmware. Please follow the steps below:    Open SIMSONN Manager v2.1.3;    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX control box, then plug the USB cable back in (keep holding the button);    Once the software shows it has entered firmware update (Flasher) mode, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu, and complete the update;    After the update, unplug and replug both the USB cable and the power supply;    In SIMSONN Manager, check the firmware versions: CPU1: 2.0.6 / CPU2: 2.0.4. If they match, the restore was successful;    Finally, click the vibration test button and confirm the haptics/vibration works normally.
